message.content:
Verify the SPLICE installer (v6.0.8) works correctly.

Check:
1. Installer package at dist/SPLICE-Installer-6.0.8.pkg and splice-website/public/downloads/SPLICE-v6.0.8.pkg
2. Verify package contents and structure
3. Check signing status
4. Verify all required files are included (CEP panel, JSX scripts, manifest)
5. Check post-install scripts for correctness
6. Verify the installer targets correct Adobe paths
7. Compare with previous working versions if available

Report any issues found and suggest fixes. Do NOT run the installer, just analyze its contents.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes"?>
<installer-gui-script minSpecVersion="2">
    <title>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</title>
    <organization>com.splice</organization>
    <domains enable_localSystem="true" enable_currentUserHome="false"/>
    <!-- Minimum OS version -->
    <os-version min="10.14"/>
    <!-- Require admin for system-wide installation -->
    <options require-scripts="true" customize="never" rootVolumeOnly="true" hostArchitectures="x86_64,arm64"/>
    <!-- Background image and styling -->
    <background file="background.png" alignment="bottomleft" scaling="none"/>
    <background-darkAqua file="background-dark.png" alignment="bottomleft" scaling="none"/>
    <!-- Welcome screen -->
    <welcome file="welcome.html" mime-type="text/html"/>
    <!-- License agreement -->
    <license file="license.html" mime-type="text/html"/>
    <!-- Readme/Introduction -->
    <readme file="readme.html" mime-type="text/html"/>
    <!-- Conclusion screen -->
    <conclusion file="conclusion.html" mime-type="text/html"/>
    <!-- Installation check script -->
    <installation-check script="installCheck()"/>
    <script>
    function installCheck() {
        // Check if Adobe Premiere Pro is running
        if (system.run('/bin/bash', '-c', 'pgrep -x "Adobe Premiere Pro"') == 0) {
            my.result.title = 'Adobe Premiere Pro is Running';
            my.result.message = 'Please close Adobe Premiere Pro before installing SPLICE.';
            my.result.type = 'Fatal';
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    }
    </script>
    <!-- Volume check script -->
    <volume-check script="volumeCheck()"/>
    <script>
    function volumeCheck() {
        // Require at least 50MB free space
        if (my.target.availableKilobytes < 51200) {
            my.result.title = 'Insufficient Disk Space';
            my.result.message = 'SPLICE requires at least 50MB of free disk space.';
            my.result.type = 'Fatal';
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    }
    </script>
    <!-- Choices outline - defines what appears in installer -->
    <choices-outline>
        <line choice="splice-cep"/>
        <line choice="splice-uxp"/>
    </choices-outline>
    <!-- CEP Extension choice (always installed) -->
    <choice id="splice-cep" title="SPLICE CEP Extension" description="Required extension for Premiere Pro 14.0 - 24.x" visible="false" enabled="true" selected="true">
        <pkg-ref id="com.splice.panel.cep"/>
    </choice>
    <!-- UXP Plugin choice (always installed) -->
    <choice id="splice-uxp" title="SPLICE UXP Plugin" description="Enhanced plugin for Premiere Pro 25.0+" visible="false" enabled="true" selected="true">
        <pkg-ref id="com.splice.panel.uxp"/>
    </choice>
    <!-- Package references -->
    <pkg-ref id="com.splice.panel.cep" version="6.0.8" installKBytes="731" auth="Root" onConclusion="None" updateKBytes="0">#splice-cep.pkg</pkg-ref>
    <pkg-ref id="com.splice.panel.uxp" version="6.0.8" installKBytes="209" auth="Root" onConclusion="None" updateKBytes="0">#splice-uxp.pkg</pkg-ref>
    <pkg-ref id="com.splice.panel.cep">
        <bundle-version/>
    </pkg-ref>
    <pkg-ref id="com.splice.panel.uxp">
        <bundle-version/>
    </pkg-ref>
</installer-gui-script>

#!/bin/bash
#
# SPLICE Plugin - macOS Postinstall Script
# This script runs after the package files are installed
#

set -e

# Configuration
PLUGIN_NAME="com.splice.panel"
CEP_SOURCE="/tmp/splice-installer/cep"
UXP_CCX="/tmp/splice-installer/splice-uxp.ccx"
LOG_FILE="/tmp/splice-installer.log"

# Installation paths
CEP_SYSTEM_PATH="/Library/Application Support/Adobe/CEP/extensions"
CEP_USER_PATH="$HOME/Library/Application Support/Adobe/CEP/extensions"
UPIA_PATH="/Library/Application Support/Adobe/Adobe Desktop Common/RemoteComponents/UPI/UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent/UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent.app/Contents/MacOS/UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent"

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

log "=== SPLICE Plugin Installation Started ==="

# Kill Premiere Pro if running (with user prompt would be handled by preflight check)
if pgrep -x "Adobe Premiere Pro" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    log "Premiere Pro is running. Attempting to close..."
    osascript -e 'tell application "Adobe Premiere Pro" to quit' 2>/dev/null || true
    sleep 2
fi

# Function to install CEP extension
install_cep() {
    log "Installing CEP extension..."
    
    # Try system-wide first (requires admin), fall back to user directory
    if [ -d "$CEP_SOURCE" ]; then
        TARGET_PATH="$CEP_SYSTEM_PATH/$PLUGIN_NAME"
        
        # Create the extensions directory if it doesn't exist
        mkdir -p "$CEP_SYSTEM_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true
        
        # Remove old installation if exists
        if [ -d "$TARGET_PATH" ]; then
            log "Removing previous CEP installation..."
            rm -rf "$TARGET_PATH"
        fi
        
        # Copy new extension
        log "Copying CEP extension to $TARGET_PATH..."
        cp -R "$CEP_SOURCE" "$TARGET_PATH"
        
        # Set permissions
        chmod -R 755 "$TARGET_PATH"
        
        log "CEP extension installed successfully"
    else
        log "WARNING: CEP source not found at $CEP_SOURCE"
    fi
}

# Function to install UXP plugin
install_uxp() {
    log "Installing UXP plugin..."
    
    if [ -f "$UXP_CCX" ]; then
        if [ -f "$UPIA_PATH" ]; then
            log "Using UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent to install UXP..."
            "$UPIA_PATH" --install "$UXP_CCX" 2>&1 | tee -a "$LOG_FILE" || {
                log "WARNING: UPIA installation failed, UXP may need manual installation"
            }
            log "UXP plugin installation attempted via UPIA"
        else
            log "WARNING: UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent not found at $UPIA_PATH"
            log "UXP plugin may need manual installation via Creative Cloud Desktop"
            
            # Copy CCX to user's Downloads for manual installation
            DOWNLOADS_PATH="$HOME/Downloads"
            if [ -d "$DOWNLOADS_PATH" ]; then
                cp "$UXP_CCX" "$DOWNLOADS_PATH/SPLICE-Plugin.ccx"
                log "CCX file copied to Downloads folder for manual installation"
            fi
        fi
    else
        log "No UXP plugin found at $UXP_CCX, skipping UXP installation"
    fi
}

# Function to enable CEP debug mode (required for extensions not from Adobe Exchange)
enable_debug_mode() {
    log "Enabling CEP debug mode for SPLICE extension..."
    # Enable for all CSXS versions (Premiere Pro 2020-2025+)
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.11 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.10 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.9 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.8 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    log "CEP debug mode enabled for all Adobe CC versions"
}

# Function to cleanup temporary files
cleanup() {
    log "Cleaning up temporary files..."
    rm -rf /tmp/splice-installer 2>/dev/null || true
    log "Cleanup complete"
}

# Main installation sequence
main() {
    # Install CEP extension
    install_cep
    
    # Install UXP plugin
    install_uxp
    
    # Enable debug mode if requested
    enable_debug_mode
    
    # Cleanup
    cleanup
    
    log "=== SPLICE Plugin Installation Complete ==="
    log "Please restart Adobe Premiere Pro to use SPLICE"
    log ""
    log "Find SPLICE at:"
    log "  - Premiere Pro 14-24: Window > Extensions > SPLICE"
    log "  - Premiere Pro 25+: Window > UXP Plugins > SPLICE"
}

# Run main installation
main

exit 0

#!/bin/bash
#
# SPLICE Plugin - macOS Preinstall Script
# This script runs before the package files are installed
#

set -e

LOG_FILE="/tmp/splice-installer.log"

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

# Initialize log file
echo "" > "$LOG_FILE"
log "=== SPLICE Plugin Pre-Installation Check ==="

# Create temporary staging directory
log "Creating staging directory..."
mkdir -p /tmp/splice-installer

# Check for Adobe Premiere Pro installation
check_premiere() {
    log "Checking for Adobe Premiere Pro..."
    
    PREMIERE_FOUND=0
    
    # Check common installation paths
    if [ -d "/Applications/Adobe Premiere Pro 2024" ] || \
       [ -d "/Applications/Adobe Premiere Pro 2025" ] || \
       [ -d "/Applications/Adobe Premiere Pro 2023" ] || \
       [ -d "/Applications/Adobe Premiere Pro CC" ] || \
       ls -d /Applications/Adobe\ Premiere\ Pro* 2>/dev/null; then
        PREMIERE_FOUND=1
        log "Adobe Premiere Pro found"
    fi
    
    if [ $PREMIERE_FOUND -eq 0 ]; then
        log "WARNING: Adobe Premiere Pro not detected"
        log "Installation will continue, but the plugin may not work until Premiere Pro is installed"
    fi
}

# Check if Premiere Pro is running
check_running() {
    log "Checking if Premiere Pro is running..."
    
    if pgrep -x "Adobe Premiere Pro" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
        log "Adobe Premiere Pro is currently running"
        # The installer UI should have already prompted to close it
        # This is a safety check
        osascript -e 'display dialog "Adobe Premiere Pro must be closed before installation. Please save your work and close Premiere Pro." buttons {"OK"} default button "OK" with icon caution' 2>/dev/null || true
        
        # Give user time to close
        sleep 2
        
        if pgrep -x "Adobe Premiere Pro" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            log "ERROR: Premiere Pro still running, installation may fail"
        fi
    else
        log "Premiere Pro is not running"
    fi
}

# Check available disk space
check_disk_space() {
    log "Checking disk space..."
    
    # Require at least 100MB free
    REQUIRED_SPACE=100000  # in KB
    AVAILABLE_SPACE=$(df -k /Library | tail -1 | awk '{print $4}')
    
    if [ "$AVAILABLE_SPACE" -lt "$REQUIRED_SPACE" ]; then
        log "ERROR: Insufficient disk space. Required: 100MB, Available: $(($AVAILABLE_SPACE / 1024))MB"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    log "Disk space check passed"
}

# Backup existing installation
backup_existing() {
    log "Checking for existing installation..."
    
    CEP_PATH="/Library/Application Support/Adobe/CEP/extensions/com.splice.panel"
    
    if [ -d "$CEP_PATH" ]; then
        BACKUP_PATH="${CEP_PATH}.backup.$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S)"
        log "Backing up existing installation to $BACKUP_PATH"
        cp -R "$CEP_PATH" "$BACKUP_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true
    fi
}

# Main
main() {
    check_premiere
    check_running
    check_disk_space
    backup_existing
    
    log "Pre-installation checks complete"
}

main

exit 0

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="6.0.8"
                   Version="12.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="6.0.8"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <!-- Support Premiere Pro 2023 (v23) through 2026+ -->
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="[23.0,99.9]"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <!-- Support multiple CEP versions for broader compatibility -->
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="11.0"/>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="12.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>

    <DispatchInfoList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main">
            <DispatchInfo>
                <Resources>
                    <MainPath>./panel/index.html</MainPath>
                    <ScriptPath>./jsx/hostScript.jsx</ScriptPath>
                    <CEFCommandLine>
                        <!-- FireCut-style CEF flags for maximum compatibility -->
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access-from-files</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--enable-nodejs</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--mixed-context</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--disable-web-security</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-running-insecure-content</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-insecure-localhost</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--enable-local-file-accesses</Parameter>
                    </CEFCommandLine>
                </Resources>
                <AccessList>
                    <URLAccess>
                        <!-- Production API -->
                        <URL>https://splice-api-production.up.railway.app</URL>
                        <!-- Web domains -->
                        <URL>https://spliceclips.com</URL>
                        <URL>https://splice.video</URL>
                        <URL>https://www.spliceclips.com</URL>
                        <URL>https://www.splice.video</URL>
                        <!-- Local development -->
                        <URL>http://localhost</URL>
                        <URL>https://localhost</URL>
                        <!-- CDN and assets -->
                        <URL>https://fonts.googleapis.com</URL>
                        <URL>https://fonts.gstatic.com</URL>
                        <!-- Allow all for broader compatibility -->
                        <URL>*</URL>
                    </URLAccess>
                </AccessList>
                <Lifecycle>
                    <AutoVisible>true</AutoVisible>
                </Lifecycle>
                <UI>
                    <Type>Panel</Type>
                    <Menu>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</Menu>
                    <Geometry>
                        <Size>
                            <Height>800</Height>
                            <Width>400</Width>
                        </Size>
                        <MinSize>
                            <Height>400</Height>
                            <Width>300</Width>
                        </MinSize>
                        <MaxSize>
                            <Height>2000</Height>
                            <Width>800</Width>
                        </MaxSize>
                    </Geometry>
                    <Icons>
                        <Icon Type="Normal">./panel/icons/icon-light.png</Icon>
                        <Icon Type="DarkNormal">./panel/icons/icon-dark.png</Icon>
                    </Icons>
                </UI>
            </DispatchInfo>
        </Extension>
    </DispatchInfoList>
</ExtensionManifest>

<installer-gui-script minSpecVersion="2">
    <title>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</title>
    <organization>com.splice</organization>
    <domains enable_localSystem="true" enable_currentUserHome="false"/>
    <!-- Minimum OS version -->
    <os-version min="10.14"/>
    <!-- Require admin for system-wide installation -->
    <options require-scripts="true" customize="never" rootVolumeOnly="true" hostArchitectures="x86_64,arm64"/>
    <!-- Background image and styling -->
    <background file="background.png" alignment="bottomleft" scaling="none"/>
    <background-darkAqua file="background-dark.png" alignment="bottomleft" scaling="none"/>
    <!-- Welcome screen -->
    <welcome file="welcome.html" mime-type="text/html"/>
    <!-- License agreement -->
    <license file="license.html" mime-type="text/html"/>
    <!-- Readme/Introduction -->
    <readme file="readme.html" mime-type="text/html"/>
    <!-- Conclusion screen -->
    <conclusion file="conclusion.html" mime-type="text/html"/>
    <!-- Installation check script -->
    <installation-check script="installCheck()"/>
    <script>
    function installCheck() {
        // Check if Adobe Premiere Pro is running
        if (system.run('/bin/bash', '-c', 'pgrep -x "Adobe Premiere Pro"') == 0) {
            my.result.title = 'Adobe Premiere Pro is Running';
            my.result.message = 'Please close Adobe Premiere Pro before installing SPLICE.';
            my.result.type = 'Fatal';
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    }
    </script>
    <!-- Volume check script -->
    <volume-check script="volumeCheck()"/>
    <script>
    function volumeCheck() {
        // Require at least 50MB free space
        if (my.target.availableKilobytes < 51200) {
            my.result.title = 'Insufficient Disk Space';
            my.result.message = 'SPLICE requires at least 50MB of free disk space.';
            my.result.type = 'Fatal';
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    }
    </script>
    <!-- Choices outline - defines what appears in installer -->
    <choices-outline>

1#!/bin/bash
     2#
     3# SPLICE Plugin - macOS PKG Installer Build Script
     4# Builds a signed .pkg installer using pkgbuild and productbuild
     5#
     6
     7set -e
     8
     9# Script directory
    10SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
    11PROJECT_ROOT="$(cd "$SCRIPT_DIR/../.." && pwd)"
    12INSTALLER_DIR="$SCRIPT_DIR"
    13
    14# Source directories
    15CEP_SOURCE="$PROJECT_ROOT/splice-cep"
    16UXP_SOURCE="$PROJECT_ROOT/splice-plugin"
    17SHARED_ASSETS="$SCRIPT_DIR/../shared/assets"
    18
    19# Build directories
    20BUILD_DIR="$INSTALLER_DIR/build"
    21STAGING_DIR="$BUILD_DIR/staging"
    22OUTPUT_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/dist"
    23
    24# Version info
    25VERSION_FILE="$SCRIPT_DIR/../shared/version.json"
    26if [ -f "$VERSION_FILE" ]; then
    27    VERSION=$(grep -o '"version"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"[^"]*"' "$VERSION_FILE" | cut -d'"' -f4)
    28else
    29    VERSION="6.0.3"
    30fi
    31
    32# Package identifiers
    33BUNDLE_ID="com.splice.panel"
    34CEP_PKG_ID="${BUNDLE_ID}.cep"
    35UXP_PKG_ID="${BUNDLE_ID}.uxp"
    36
    37# Signing identity (set via environment or parameter)
    38SIGNING_IDENTITY="${SIGNING_IDENTITY:-}"
    39NOTARIZE="${NOTARIZE:-false}"
    40APPLE_ID="${APPLE_ID:-}"
    41TEAM_ID="${TEAM_ID:-}"
    42APP_PASSWORD="${APP_PASSWORD:-}"
    43
    44# Output filenames
    45PKG_NAME="SPLICE-Installer-${VERSION}.pkg"
    46UNSIGNED_PKG_NAME="SPLICE-Installer-${VERSION}-unsigned.pkg"
    47
    48# Colors for output
    49RED='\033[0;31m'
    50GREEN='\033[0;32m'
    51YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
    52NC='\033[0m' # No Color
    53
    54log_info() {
    55    echo -e "${GREEN}[INFO]${NC} $1"
    56}
    57
    58log_warn() {
    59    echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARN]${NC} $1"
    60}
    61
    62log_error() {
    63    echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"
    64}
    65
    66# Show usage
    67usage() {
    68    echo "Usage: $0 [OPTIONS]"
    69    echo ""
    70    echo "Options:"
    71    echo "  --sign IDENTITY     Sign package with Developer ID Installer certificate"
    72    echo "  --notarize          Notarize the signed package (requires --sign)"
    73    echo "  --apple-id EMAIL    Apple ID for notarization"
    74    echo "  --team-id ID        Team ID for notarization"
    75    echo "  --password PWD      App-specific password for notarization"
    76    echo "  --help              Show this help message"
    77    echo ""
    78    echo "Environment variables:"
    79    echo "  SIGNING_IDENTITY    Developer ID Installer certificate name"
    80    echo "  NOTARIZE            Set to 'true' to notarize"
    81    echo "  APPLE_ID            Apple ID email"
    82    echo "  TEAM_ID             Apple Developer Team ID"
    83    echo "  APP_PASSWORD        App-specific password for notarization"
    84    exit 1
    85}
    86
    87# Parse arguments
    88while [[ $# -gt 0 ]]; do
    89    case $1 in
    90        --sign)
    91            SIGNING_IDENTITY="$2"
    92            shift 2
    93            ;;
    94        --notarize)
    95            NOTARIZE="true"
    96            shift
    97            ;;
    98        --apple-id)
    99            APPLE_ID="$2"
   100            shift 2
   101            ;;
   102        --team-id)
   103            TEAM_ID="$2"
   104            shift 2
   105            ;;
   106        --password)
   107            APP_PASSWORD="$2"
   108            shift 2
   109            ;;
   110        --help)
   111            usage
   112            ;;
   113        *)
   114            log_error "Unknown option: $1"
   115            usage
   116            ;;
   117    esac
   118done
   119
   120# Cleanup previous builds
   121cleanup() {
   122    log_info "Cleaning up previous builds..."
   123    rm -rf "$BUILD_DIR"
   124    mkdir -p "$BUILD_DIR"
   125    mkdir -p "$STAGING_DIR"
   126    mkdir -p "$OUTPUT_DIR"
   127}
   128
   129# Stage CEP extension files
   130stage_cep() {
   131    log_info "Staging CEP extension..."
   132    
   133    if [ ! -d "$CEP_SOURCE" ]; then
   134        log_error "CEP source directory not found: $CEP_SOURCE"
   135        exit 1
   136    fi
   137    
   138    # Create staging structure
   139    local cep_staging="$STAGING_DIR/cep/tmp/splice-installer/cep"
   140    mkdir -p "$cep_staging"
   141    
   142    # Copy CEP extension files
   143    cp -R "$CEP_SOURCE/CSXS" "$cep_staging/"
   144    cp -R "$CEP_SOURCE/jsx" "$cep_staging/"
   145    cp -R "$CEP_SOURCE/panel" "$cep_staging/"
   146    
   147    # Copy additional files if they exist
   148    [ -f "$CEP_SOURCE/.debug" ] && cp "$CEP_SOURCE/.debug" "$cep_staging/"
   149    [ -f "$CEP_SOURCE/mimetype" ] && cp "$CEP_SOURCE/mimetype" "$cep_staging/"
   150    
   151    log_info "CEP extension staged"
   152}
   153
   154# Stage UXP plugin files and create CCX
   155stage_uxp() {
   156    log_info "Staging UXP plugin..."
   157    
   158    if [ ! -d "$UXP_SOURCE" ]; then
   159        log_warn "UXP source directory not found: $UXP_SOURCE"
   160        log_warn "Skipping UXP plugin packaging"
   161        return 0
   162    fi
   163    
   164    # Create staging structure
   165    local uxp_staging="$STAGING_DIR/uxp/tmp/splice-installer"
   166    mkdir -p "$uxp_staging"
   167    
   168    # Create CCX package (essentially a zip with .ccx extension)
   169    local ccx_temp="$BUILD_DIR/ccx-temp"
   170    mkdir -p "$ccx_temp"
   171    
   172    # Copy UXP plugin files
   173    cp -R "$UXP_SOURCE"/* "$ccx_temp/"
   174    
   175    # Create the CCX file
   176    pushd "$ccx_temp" > /dev/null
   177    zip -r "$uxp_staging/splice-uxp.ccx" . -x "*.DS_Store" -x "__MACOSX/*"
   178    popd > /dev/null
   179    
   180    rm -rf "$ccx_temp"
   181    
   182    log_info "UXP plugin staged as CCX"
   183}
   184
   185# Build component packages
   186build_component_packages() {
   187    log_info "Building component packages..."
   188    
   189    # Build CEP package
   190    pkgbuild \
   191        --root "$STAGING_DIR/cep" \
   192        --identifier "$CEP_PKG_ID" \
   193        --version "$VERSION" \
   194        --scripts "$INSTALLER_DIR/scripts" \
   195        "$BUILD_DIR/splice-cep.pkg"
   196    
   197    log_info "CEP component package created"
   198    
   199    # Build UXP package if CCX was created
   200    if [ -f "$STAGING_DIR/uxp/tmp/splice-installer/splice-uxp.ccx" ]; then
   201        pkgbuild \
   202            --root "$STAGING_DIR/uxp" \
   203            --identifier "$UXP_PKG_ID" \
   204            --version "$VERSION" \
   205            "$BUILD_DIR/splice-uxp.pkg"
   206        
   207        log_info "UXP component package created"
   208    fi
   209}
   210
   211# Build product archive
   212build_product() {
   213    log_info "Building product archive..."
   214    
   215    # Prepare resources directory
   216    local resources_dir="$BUILD_DIR/resources"
   217    mkdir -p "$resources_dir"
   218    
   219    # Copy installer UI resources
   220    cp "$INSTALLER_DIR/resources/"*.html "$resources_dir/" 2>/dev/null || true
   221    
   222    # Copy shared assets
   223    if [ -d "$SHARED_ASSETS" ]; then
   224        cp "$SHARED_ASSETS/"* "$resources_dir/" 2>/dev/null || true
   225    fi
   226    
   227    # Update distribution.xml with actual package references
   228    local dist_xml="$BUILD_DIR/distribution.xml"
   229    cp "$INSTALLER_DIR/distribution.xml" "$dist_xml"
   230    
   231    # Replace version placeholder
   232    sed -i '' "s/version=\"6.0.3\"/version=\"$VERSION\"/g" "$dist_xml"
   233    
   234    # Build the product
   235    local output_pkg="$OUTPUT_DIR/$UNSIGNED_PKG_NAME"
   236    
   237    productbuild \
   238        --distribution "$dist_xml" \
   239        --resources "$resources_dir" \
   240        --package-path "$BUILD_DIR" \
   241        "$output_pkg"
   242    
   243    log_info "Unsigned package created: $output_pkg"
   244}
   245
   246# Sign the package
   247sign_package() {
   248    if [ -z "$SIGNING_IDENTITY" ]; then
   249        log_warn "No signing identity provided, skipping signing"
   250        log_warn "Package will show 'unidentified developer' warning on macOS"
   251        
   252        # Rename unsigned package if not signing
   253        mv "$OUTPUT_DIR/$UNSIGNED_PKG_NAME" "$OUTPUT_DIR/$PKG_NAME"
   254        return 0
   255    fi
   256    
   257    log_info "Signing package with identity: $SIGNING_IDENTITY"
   258    
   259    local unsigned_pkg="$OUTPUT_DIR/$UNSIGNED_PKG_NAME"
   260    local signed_pkg="$OUTPUT_DIR/$PKG_NAME"
   261    
   262    productsign \
   263        --sign "$SIGNING_IDENTITY" \
   264        "$unsigned_pkg" \
   265        "$signed_pkg"
   266    
   267    # Verify signature
   268    pkgutil --check-signature "$signed_pkg"
   269    
   270    # Remove unsigned package
   271    rm "$unsigned_pkg"
   272    
   273    log_info "Package signed successfully: $signed_pkg"
   274}
   275
   276# Notarize the package
   277notarize_package() {
   278    if [ "$NOTARIZE" != "true" ]; then
   279        log_info "Skipping notarization"
   280        return 0
   281    fi
   282    
   283    if [ -z "$APPLE_ID" ] || [ -z "$TEAM_ID" ] || [ -z "$APP_PASSWORD" ]; then
   284        log_error "Notarization requires APPLE_ID, TEAM_ID, and APP_PASSWORD"
   285        exit 1
   286    fi
   287    
   288    log_info "Notarizing package..."
   289    
   290    local pkg_path="$OUTPUT_DIR/$PKG_NAME"
   291    
   292    # Submit for notarization
   293    xcrun notarytool submit "$pkg_path" \
   294        --apple-id "$APPLE_ID" \
   295        --team-id "$TEAM_ID" \
   296        --password "$APP_PASSWORD" \
   297        --wait
   298    
   299    # Staple the notarization ticket
   300    log_info "Stapling notarization ticket..."
   301    xcrun stapler staple "$pkg_path"
   302    
   303    # Verify stapling
   304    xcrun stapler validate "$pkg_path"
   305    
   306    log_info "Package notarized and stapled successfully"
   307}
   308
   309# Main build process
   310main() {
   311    echo "========================================"
   312    echo "SPLICE macOS Installer Build"
   313    echo "Version: $VERSION"
   314    echo "========================================"
   315    echo ""
   316    
   317    cleanup
   318    stage_cep
   319    stage_uxp
   320    build_component_packages
   321    build_product
   322    sign_package
   323    notarize_package
   324    
   325    echo ""
   326    echo "========================================"

#!/bin/bash
#
# SPLICE Plugin - macOS PKG Installer Build Script
# Builds a signed .pkg installer using pkgbuild and productbuild
#

set -e

# Script directory
SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
PROJECT_ROOT="$(cd "$SCRIPT_DIR/../.." && pwd)"
INSTALLER_DIR="$SCRIPT_DIR"

# Source directories
CEP_SOURCE="$PROJECT_ROOT/splice-cep"
UXP_SOURCE="$PROJECT_ROOT/splice-plugin"
SHARED_ASSETS="$SCRIPT_DIR/../shared/assets"

# Build directories
BUILD_DIR="$INSTALLER_DIR/build"
STAGING_DIR="$BUILD_DIR/staging"
OUTPUT_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/dist"

# Version info
VERSION_FILE="$SCRIPT_DIR/../shared/version.json"
if [ -f "$VERSION_FILE" ]; then
    VERSION=$(grep -o '"version"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"[^"]*"' "$VERSION_FILE" | cut -d'"' -f4)
else
    VERSION="6.0.3"
fi

# Package identifiers
BUNDLE_ID="com.splice.panel"
CEP_PKG_ID="${BUNDLE_ID}.cep"
UXP_PKG_ID="${BUNDLE_ID}.uxp"

# Signing identity (set via environment or parameter)
SIGNING_IDENTITY="${SIGNING_IDENTITY:-}"
NOTARIZE="${NOTARIZE:-false}"
APPLE_ID="${APPLE_ID:-}"
TEAM_ID="${TEAM_ID:-}"
APP_PASSWORD="${APP_PASSWORD:-}"

# Output filenames
PKG_NAME="SPLICE-Installer-${VERSION}.pkg"
UNSIGNED_PKG_NAME="SPLICE-Installer-${VERSION}-unsigned.pkg"

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

log_info() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}[INFO]${NC} $1"
}

log_warn() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARN]${NC} $1"
}

log_error() {
    echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"
}

# Show usage
usage() {
    echo "Usage: $0 [OPTIONS]"
    echo ""
    echo "Options:"
    echo "  --sign IDENTITY     Sign package with Developer ID Installer certificate"
    echo "  --notarize          Notarize the signed package (requires --sign)"
    echo "  --apple-id EMAIL    Apple ID for notarization"
    echo "  --team-id ID        Team ID for notarization"
    echo "  --password PWD      App-specific password for notarization"
    echo "  --help              Show this help message"
    echo ""
    echo "Environment variables:"
    echo "  SIGNING_IDENTITY    Developer ID Installer certificate name"
    echo "  NOTARIZE            Set to 'true' to notarize"
    echo "  APPLE_ID            Apple ID email"
    echo "  TEAM_ID             Apple Developer Team ID"
    echo "  APP_PASSWORD        App-specific password for notarization"
    exit 1
}

# Parse arguments
while [[ $# -gt 0 ]]; do
    case $1 in
        --sign)
            SIGNING_IDENTITY="$2"
            shift 2
            ;;
        --notarize)
            NOTARIZE="true"
            shift
            ;;
        --apple-id)
            APPLE_ID="$2"
            shift 2
            ;;
        --team-id)
            TEAM_ID="$2"
            shift 2
            ;;
        --password)
            APP_PASSWORD="$2"
            shift 2
            ;;
        --help)
            usage
            ;;
        *)
            log_error "Unknown option: $1"
            usage
            ;;
    esac
done

# Cleanup previous builds
cleanup() {
    log_info "Cleaning up previous builds..."
    rm -rf "$BUILD_DIR"
    mkdir -p "$BUILD_DIR"
    mkdir -p "$STAGING_DIR"
    mkdir -p "$OUTPUT_DIR"
}

# Stage CEP extension files
stage_cep() {
    log_info "Staging CEP extension..."
    
    if [ ! -d "$CEP_SOURCE" ]; then
        log_error "CEP source directory not found: $CEP_SOURCE"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    # Create staging structure
    local cep_staging="$STAGING_DIR/cep/tmp/splice-installer/cep"
    mkdir -p "$cep_staging"
    
    # Copy CEP extension files
    cp -R "$CEP_SOURCE/CSXS" "$cep_staging/"
    cp -R "$CEP_SOURCE/jsx" "$cep_staging/"
    cp -R "$CEP_SOURCE/panel" "$cep_staging/"
    
    # Copy additional files if they exist
    [ -f "$CEP_SOURCE/.debug" ] && cp "$CEP_SOURCE/.debug" "$cep_staging/"
    [ -f "$CEP_SOURCE/mimetype" ] && cp "$CEP_SOURCE/mimetype" "$cep_staging/"
    
    log_info "CEP extension staged"
}

# Stage UXP plugin files and create CCX
stage_uxp() {
    log_info "Staging UXP plugin..."
    
    if [ ! -d "$UXP_SOURCE" ]; then
        log_warn "UXP source directory not found: $UXP_SOURCE"
        log_warn "Skipping UXP plugin packaging"
        return 0
    fi
    
    # Create staging structure
    local uxp_staging="$STAGING_DIR/uxp/tmp/splice-installer"
    mkdir -p "$uxp_staging"
    
    # Create CCX package (essentially a zip with .ccx extension)
    local ccx_temp="$BUILD_DIR/ccx-temp"
    mkdir -p "$ccx_temp"
    
    # Copy UXP plugin files
    cp -R "$UXP_SOURCE"/* "$ccx_temp/"
    
    # Create the CCX file
    pushd "$ccx_temp" > /dev/null
    zip -r "$uxp_staging/splice-uxp.ccx" . -x "*.DS_Store" -x "__MACOSX/*"
    popd > /dev/null
    
    rm -rf "$ccx_temp"
    
    log_info "UXP plugin staged as CCX"
}

# Build component packages
build_component_packages() {
    log_info "Building component packages..."
    
    # Build CEP package
    pkgbuild \
        --root "$STAGING_DIR/cep" \
        --identifier "$CEP_PKG_ID" \
        --version "$VERSION" \
        --scripts "$INSTALLER_DIR/scripts" \
        "$BUILD_DIR/splice-cep.pkg"
    
    log_info "CEP component package created"
    
    # Build UXP package if CCX was created
    if [ -f "$STAGING_DIR/uxp/tmp/splice-installer/splice-uxp.ccx" ]; then
        pkgbuild \
            --root "$STAGING_DIR/uxp" \
            --identifier "$UXP_PKG_ID" \
            --version "$VERSION" \
            "$BUILD_DIR/splice-uxp.pkg"
        
        log_info "UXP component package created"
    fi
}

# Build product archive
build_product() {
    log_info "Building product archive..."
    
    # Prepare resources directory
    local resources_dir="$BUILD_DIR/resources"
    mkdir -p "$resources_dir"
    
    # Copy installer UI resources
    cp "$INSTALLER_DIR/resources/"*.html "$resources_dir/" 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Copy shared assets
    if [ -d "$SHARED_ASSETS" ]; then
        cp "$SHARED_ASSETS/"* "$resources_dir/" 2>/dev/null || true
    fi
    
    # Update distribution.xml with actual package references
    local dist_xml="$BUILD_DIR/distribution.xml"
    cp "$INSTALLER_DIR/distribution.xml" "$dist_xml"
    
    # Replace version placeholder
    sed -i '' "s/version=\"6.0.3\"/version=\"$VERSION\"/g" "$dist_xml"
    
    # Build the product
    local output_pkg="$OUTPUT_DIR/$UNSIGNED_PKG_NAME"
    
    productbuild \
        --distribution "$dist_xml" \
        --resources "$resources_dir" \
        --package-path "$BUILD_DIR" \
        "$output_pkg"
    
    log_info "Unsigned package created: $output_pkg"
}

# Sign the package
sign_package() {
    if [ -z "$SIGNING_IDENTITY" ]; then
        log_warn "No signing identity provided, skipping signing"
        log_warn "Package will show 'unidentified developer' warning on macOS"
        
        # Rename unsigned package if not signing
        mv "$OUTPUT_DIR/$UNSIGNED_PKG_NAME" "$OUTPUT_DIR/$PKG_NAME"
        return 0
    fi
    
    log_info "Signing package with identity: $SIGNING_IDENTITY"
    
    local unsigned_pkg="$OUTPUT_DIR/$UNSIGNED_PKG_NAME"
    local signed_pkg="$OUTPUT_DIR/$PKG_NAME"
    
    productsign \
        --sign "$SIGNING_IDENTITY" \
        "$unsigned_pkg" \
        "$signed_pkg"
    
    # Verify signature
    pkgutil --check-signature "$signed_pkg"
    
    # Remove unsigned package
    rm "$unsigned_pkg"
    
    log_info "Package signed successfully: $signed_pkg"
}

# Notarize the package
notarize_package() {
    if [ "$NOTARIZE" != "true" ]; then
        log_info "Skipping notarization"
        return 0
    fi
    
    if [ -z "$APPLE_ID" ] || [ -z "$TEAM_ID" ] || [ -z "$APP_PASSWORD" ]; then
        log_error "Notarization requires APPLE_ID, TEAM_ID, and APP_PASSWORD"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    log_info "Notarizing package..."
    
    local pkg_path="$OUTPUT_DIR/$PKG_NAME"
    
    # Submit for notarization
    xcrun notarytool submit "$pkg_path" \
        --apple-id "$APPLE_ID" \
        --team-id "$TEAM_ID" \
        --password "$APP_PASSWORD" \
        --wait
    
    # Staple the notarization ticket
    log_info "Stapling notarization ticket..."
    xcrun stapler staple "$pkg_path"
    
    # Verify stapling
    xcrun stapler validate "$pkg_path"
    
    log_info "Package notarized and stapled successfully"
}

# Main build process
main() {
    echo "========================================"
    echo "SPLICE macOS Installer Build"
    echo "Version: $VERSION"
    echo "========================================"
    echo ""
    
    cleanup
    stage_cep
    stage_uxp
    build_component_packages
    build_product
    sign_package
    notarize_package
    
    echo ""
    echo "========================================"
    log_info "Build complete!"
    echo "Output: $OUTPUT_DIR/$PKG_NAME"
    echo "========================================"
}

main

content.content:
#!/bin/bash
#
# SPLICE Plugin - macOS Postinstall Script
# This script runs after the package files are installed
#

set -e

# Configuration
PLUGIN_NAME="com.splice.panel"
CEP_SOURCE="/tmp/splice-installer/cep"
UXP_CCX="/tmp/splice-installer/splice-uxp.ccx"
LOG_FILE="/tmp/splice-installer.log"

# Installation paths
CEP_SYSTEM_PATH="/Library/Application Support/Adobe/CEP/extensions"
CEP_USER_PATH="$HOME/Library/Application Support/Adobe/CEP/extensions"
UPIA_PATH="/Library/Application Support/Adobe/Adobe Desktop Common/RemoteComponents/UPI/UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent/UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent.app/Contents/MacOS/UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent"

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

log "=== SPLICE Plugin Installation Started ==="

# Kill Premiere Pro if running (with user prompt would be handled by preflight check)
if pgrep -x "Adobe Premiere Pro" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    log "Premiere Pro is running. Attempting to close..."
    osascript -e 'tell application "Adobe Premiere Pro" to quit' 2>/dev/null || true
    sleep 2
fi

# Function to install CEP extension
install_cep() {
    log "Installing CEP extension..."
    
    # Try system-wide first (requires admin), fall back to user directory
    if [ -d "$CEP_SOURCE" ]; then
        TARGET_PATH="$CEP_SYSTEM_PATH/$PLUGIN_NAME"
        
        # Create the extensions directory if it doesn't exist
        mkdir -p "$CEP_SYSTEM_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true
        
        # Remove old installation if exists
        if [ -d "$TARGET_PATH" ]; then
            log "Removing previous CEP installation..."
            rm -rf "$TARGET_PATH"
        fi
        
        # Copy new extension
        log "Copying CEP extension to $TARGET_PATH..."
        cp -R "$CEP_SOURCE" "$TARGET_PATH"
        
        # Set permissions
        chmod -R 755 "$TARGET_PATH"
        
        log "CEP extension installed successfully"
    else
        log "WARNING: CEP source not found at $CEP_SOURCE"
    fi
}

# Function to install UXP plugin
install_uxp() {
    log "Installing UXP plugin..."
    
    if [ -f "$UXP_CCX" ]; then
        if [ -f "$UPIA_PATH" ]; then
            log "Using UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent to install UXP..."
            "$UPIA_PATH" --install "$UXP_CCX" 2>&1 | tee -a "$LOG_FILE" || {
                log "WARNING: UPIA installation failed, UXP may need manual installation"
            }
            log "UXP plugin installation attempted via UPIA"
        else
            log "WARNING: UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent not found at $UPIA_PATH"
            log "UXP plugin may need manual installation via Creative Cloud Desktop"
            
            # Copy CCX to user's Downloads for manual installation
            DOWNLOADS_PATH="$HOME/Downloads"
            if [ -d "$DOWNLOADS_PATH" ]; then
                cp "$UXP_CCX" "$DOWNLOADS_PATH/SPLICE-Plugin.ccx"
                log "CCX file copied to Downloads folder for manual installation"
            fi
        fi
    else
        log "No UXP plugin found at $UXP_CCX, skipping UXP installation"
    fi
}

# Function to enable CEP debug mode (required for extensions not from Adobe Exchange)
enable_debug_mode() {
    log "Enabling CEP debug mode for SPLICE extension..."
    # Enable for all CSXS versions (Premiere Pro 2020-2025+)
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.11 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.10 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.9 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.8 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    log "CEP debug mode enabled for all Adobe CC versions"
}

# Function to cleanup temporary files
cleanup() {
    log "Cleaning up temporary files..."
    rm -rf /tmp/splice-installer 2>/dev/null || true
    log "Cleanup complete"
}

# Main installation sequence
main() {
    # Install CEP extension
    install_cep
    
    # Install UXP plugin
    install_uxp
    
    # Enable debug mode if requested
    enable_debug_mode
    
    # Cleanup
    cleanup
    
    log "=== SPLICE Plugin Installation Complete ==="
    log "Please restart Adobe Premiere Pro to use SPLICE"
    log ""
    log "Find SPLICE at:"
    log "  - Premiere Pro 14-24: Window > Extensions > SPLICE"
    log "  - Premiere Pro 25+: Window > UXP Plugins > SPLICE"
}

# Run main installation
main

exit 0

#!/bin/bash
#
# SPLICE Plugin - macOS Postinstall Script
# This script runs after the package files are installed
#

set -e

# Configuration
PLUGIN_NAME="com.splice.panel"
CEP_SOURCE="/tmp/splice-installer/cep"
UXP_CCX="/tmp/splice-installer/splice-uxp.ccx"
LOG_FILE="/tmp/splice-installer.log"

# Installation paths
CEP_SYSTEM_PATH="/Library/Application Support/Adobe/CEP/extensions"
CEP_USER_PATH="$HOME/Library/Application Support/Adobe/CEP/extensions"
UPIA_PATH="/Library/Application Support/Adobe/Adobe Desktop Common/RemoteComponents/UPI/UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent/UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent.app/Contents/MacOS/UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent"

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

log "=== SPLICE Plugin Installation Started ==="

# Kill Premiere Pro if running (with user prompt would be handled by preflight check)
if pgrep -x "Adobe Premiere Pro" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    log "Premiere Pro is running. Attempting to close..."
    osascript -e 'tell application "Adobe Premiere Pro" to quit' 2>/dev/null || true
    sleep 2
fi

# Function to install CEP extension
install_cep() {
    log "Installing CEP extension..."
    
    # Try system-wide first (requires admin), fall back to user directory
    if [ -d "$CEP_SOURCE" ]; then
        TARGET_PATH="$CEP_SYSTEM_PATH/$PLUGIN_NAME"
        
        # Create the extensions directory if it doesn't exist
        mkdir -p "$CEP_SYSTEM_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true
        
        # Remove old installation if exists
        if [ -d "$TARGET_PATH" ]; then
            log "Removing previous CEP installation..."
            rm -rf "$TARGET_PATH"
        fi
        
        # Copy new extension
        log "Copying CEP extension to $TARGET_PATH..."
        cp -R "$CEP_SOURCE" "$TARGET_PATH"
        
        # Set permissions
        chmod -R 755 "$TARGET_PATH"
        
        log "CEP extension installed successfully"
    else
        log "WARNING: CEP source not found at $CEP_SOURCE"
    fi
}

# Function to install UXP plugin
install_uxp() {
    log "Installing UXP plugin..."
    
    if [ -f "$UXP_CCX" ]; then
        if [ -f "$UPIA_PATH" ]; then
            log "Using UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent to install UXP..."
            "$UPIA_PATH" --install "$UXP_CCX" 2>&1 | tee -a "$LOG_FILE" || {
                log "WARNING: UPIA installation failed, UXP may need manual installation"
            }
            log "UXP plugin installation attempted via UPIA"
        else
            log "WARNING: UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent not found at $UPIA_PATH"
            log "UXP plugin may need manual installation via Creative Cloud Desktop"
            
            # Copy CCX to user's Downloads for manual installation
            DOWNLOADS_PATH="$HOME/Downloads"
            if [ -d "$DOWNLOADS_PATH" ]; then
                cp "$UXP_CCX" "$DOWNLOADS_PATH/SPLICE-Plugin.ccx"
                log "CCX file copied to Downloads folder for manual installation"
            fi
        fi
    else
        log "No UXP plugin found at $UXP_CCX, skipping UXP installation"
    fi
}

# Function to enable CEP debug mode (required for extensions not from Adobe Exchange)
enable_debug_mode() {
    log "Enabling CEP debug mode for SPLICE extension..."
    # Enable for all CSXS versions (Premiere Pro 2020-2025+)
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.11 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.10 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.9 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.8 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
    log "CEP debug mode enabled for all Adobe CC versions"
}

# Function to cleanup temporary files
cleanup() {
    log "Cleaning up temporary files..."
    rm -rf /tmp/splice-installer 2>/dev/null || true
    log "Cleanup complete"
}

# Main installation sequence
main() {
    # Install CEP extension
    install_cep
    
    # Install UXP plugin
    install_uxp
    
    # Enable debug mode if requested
    enable_debug_mode
    
    # Cleanup
    cleanup
    
    log "=== SPLICE Plugin Installation Complete ==="
    log "Please restart Adobe Premiere Pro to use SPLICE"
    log ""
    log "Find SPLICE at:"
    log "  - Premiere Pro 14-24: Window > Extensions > SPLICE"
    log "  - Premiere Pro 25+: Window > UXP Plugins > SPLICE"
}

# Run main installation
main

exit 0

---

# SPLICE Installer v6.0.8 - QA Verification Report

## Overall Verdict: **PASS WITH ISSUES**

---

## Requirements Checklist

| Requirement | Status | Notes |
|-------------|--------|-------|
| Installer package exists at dist/SPLICE-Installer-6.0.8.pkg | PASS | File exists, 363,727 bytes |
| Installer package exists in splice-website/public/downloads/ | PARTIAL | `SPLICE-v6.0.8.pkg` (360,597 bytes) exists, but named differently than expected `SPLICE-Installer-6.0.8.pkg` |
| Package contents and structure valid | PASS | Proper component structure with CEP and UXP packages |
| Signing status | FAIL | Package is unsigned |
| All required files included (CEP panel, JSX scripts, manifest) | PASS WITH ISSUES | Core files present, but includes development artifacts (.claude directory) |
| Post-install scripts correct | PASS | Scripts properly install CEP extension and enable debug mode |
| Installer targets correct Adobe paths | PASS | Uses correct CEP extension path `/Library/Application Support/Adobe/CEP/extensions` |
| Consistency between dist and website packages | FAIL | Different package contents (SHA256 mismatch) |

---

## Detailed Findings

### 1. **CRITICAL: Package Not Signed**
**Priority: Critical**

The installer package has no code signature:
```
Package "SPLICE-Installer-6.0.8.pkg":
   Status: no signature
```

**Impact**: macOS will show "unidentified developer" warning, and on newer macOS versions with Gatekeeper, users may be blocked from running the installer.

**Recommendation**: Sign the package with a valid Developer ID Installer certificate using:
```bash
productsign --sign "Developer ID Installer: YOUR_TEAM (TEAM_ID)" unsigned.pkg signed.pkg
```

---

### 2. **HIGH: Version Inconsistency in Build System**
**Priority: High**

The `installer/shared/version.json` file still shows version `6.0.3`:
```json
{
  "version": "6.0.3",
  ...
}
```

But the built packages are v6.0.8. This indicates manual version override during build.

**Recommendation**: Update `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/installer/shared/version.json` to version `6.0.8` to maintain consistency.

---

### 3. **HIGH: Two Different v6.0.8 Packages**
**Priority: High**

There are two v6.0.8 packages with different contents:

| Location | SHA256 | Size |
|----------|--------|------|
| `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/dist/SPLICE-Installer-6.0.8.pkg` | `a0969ad3efd4c67...` | 363,727 bytes |
| `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/public/downloads/SPLICE-v6.0.8.pkg` | `81266f2171d3b65...` | 360,597 bytes |

**Differences found**:
- `index.html` - different content
- `main.js` - different content
- `config.js` - different content
- `multitrack.js` - different content
- `music.js` - different content
- Additional `.claude/file-changes.json` in dist package

**Recommendation**: Ensure only one canonical package is built and deployed to both locations.

---

### 4. **MEDIUM: Development Artifacts in Package**
**Priority: Medium**

The installer includes `.claude/` directory with development files:
```
./tmp/splice-installer/cep/panel/js/.claude/checkpoint-state.json
./tmp/splice-installer/cep/panel/js/.claude/file-changes.json
./tmp/splice-installer/cep/panel/js/.claude/health.json
```

These are Claude Code development tracking files and should not be included in production builds.

**Recommendation**: Add exclusion in build script:
```bash
# In build-pkg.sh, exclude .claude directories
rsync -a --exclude='.claude' "$CEP_SOURCE/panel" "$cep_staging/"
```

---

### 5. **MEDIUM: Manifest Version Differences**
**Priority: Medium**

The source manifest differs from the packaged manifest:

**Source manifest** (`splice-cep/CSXS/manifest.xml`):
- Version attribute: `11.0`
- Host range: `[22.0,99.9]` (PP 2022+)
- Single CSXS runtime: `11.0`
- 4 CEF command line parameters

**Packaged manifest** (in installer):
- Version attribute: `12.0`
- Host range: `[23.0,99.9]` (PP 2023+)
- Multiple CSXS runtimes: `10.0`, `11.0`, `12.0`
- 8 CEF command line parameters (additional security relaxation flags)

The packaged version adds:
- `--disable-web-security`
- `--allow-running-insecure-content`
- `--allow-insecure-localhost`
- `--enable-local-file-accesses`
- `<URL>*</URL>` (allow all URLs)

**Impact**: The packaged manifest has more permissive security settings. While this improves compatibility, it represents a security-for-compatibility tradeoff.

**Recommendation**: Document these security settings and ensure they are intentional. Consider if all are necessary.

---

### 6. **LOW: compatibility.js Removed from Package**
**Priority: Low**

The source `splice-cep/panel/js/compatibility.js` is not included in the package, and the packaged `index.html` no longer references it.

The source `main.js` references `SpliceCompatibility` (7 locations), but the packaged `main.js` has these references removed.

**Status**: This appears intentional - the package was updated to remove the dependency. No action needed.

---

### 7. **INFO: Post-Install Scripts Analysis**
**Priority: Informational**

The post-install script (`/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/installer/macos/scripts/postinstall`) correctly:
- Installs CEP extension to `/Library/Application Support/Adobe/CEP/extensions/com.splice.panel`
- Enables CEP debug mode for CSXS versions 8-11
- Handles UXP CCX installation via UnifiedPluginInstallerAgent
- Falls back to copying CCX to Downloads if UPIA not found
- Cleans up temporary files

**Missing**: Does not enable CSXS.12 debug mode (for newest Premiere Pro versions).

**Recommendation**: Add to postinstall:
```bash
defaults write com.adobe.CSXS.12 PlayerDebugMode 1 2>/dev/null || true
```

---

### 8. **INFO: Distribution.xml Configuration**
**Priority: Informational**

The Distribution.xml properly:
- Requires macOS 10.14+ (Mojave)
- Checks if Premiere Pro is running before installation
- Requires 50MB disk space
- Supports both x86_64 and arm64 architectures
- Targets system-wide installation (rootVolumeOnly)

---

## Required Files Verification

### CEP Panel Files

| File | Status | Notes |
|------|--------|-------|
| `CSXS/manifest.xml` | PASS | Version 6.0.8, supports PP 23.0-99.9 |
| `jsx/hostScript.jsx` | PASS | 1837 lines, v6.0.8 |
| `panel/index.html` | PASS | Present with script references |
| `panel/css/style.css` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/main.js` | PASS | 2036 lines |
| `panel/js/CSInterface.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/config.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/credits.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/builder.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/multitrack.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/music.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/animatedCaptions.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/textEditor.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/socialReframe.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/slice6-analyze.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/slice7-apply.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/js/slice8-silence.js` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/icons/icon-light.png` | PASS | Present |
| `panel/icons/icon-dark.png` | PASS | Present |
| `.debug` | PASS | Present (port 8088) |

### UXP Plugin Files

|------|--------|-------|
| `splice-uxp.ccx` | PASS | 212,803 bytes, valid ZIP format |

---

## Summary of Fixes Required

### Critical (Must Fix Before Release)
1. **Sign the installer package** with Developer ID Installer certificate

3. **Synchronize packages** - ensure dist and website have identical packages

- `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/dist/SPLICE-Installer-6.0.8.pkg` - Main installer (363,727 bytes)
- `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/public/downloads/SPLICE-v6.0.8.pkg` - Website installer (360,597 bytes)
